title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 October 2013 - XWiki

09:46 <vmassol> good morning  
09:47 <vmassol> fyi I'm moving SS outside of the internal package today  
09:50 <gdelhumeau> Script services ?  
09:51 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Script+Module  
09:56 <polx> has quit  
10:03 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
10:05 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <polx> has quit  
10:11 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <tmortagne> ( vmassol: don't move the distribution one )  
10:15 <vmassol> what's different with this one?  
10:17 <tmortagne> it is supposed to be internal  
10:17 <tmortagne> it's still internal distribution stuff not made public yet  
10:17 <tmortagne> like all the distribution API  
10:17 <vmassol> why not public but @unstable?  
10:17 <vmassol> that gives you more than 1 year  
10:17 <tmortagne> because it's not what @Unstable mean  
10:18 <vmassol> you mean we'll never want to make it public?  
10:18 <tmortagne> not the way it is now yes  
10:18 <vmassol> ok...  
10:18 <vmassol> I don't like exceptions but ok  
10:18 <vmassol> :)  
10:18 <tmortagne> it's not exception  
10:19 <vmassol> please add a javadoc comment explaning this  
10:19 <vmassol> (if not already there)  
10:19 <vmassol> it is an excpetion  
10:19 <vmassol> because  
10:19 <tmortagne> ?so all the classes we have in internal are exception too  
10:19 <vmassol> I was planning to write a checkstyle check to fail the build if a ScriptService was in the internal package  
10:20 <vmassol> no but internal SS yes  
10:20 <vmassol> since we said that all SS should be outside the intenral package  
10:20 <vmassol> that's what is called an exception in English ;)  
10:21 <tmortagne> public SS should be outside of internal  
10:21 <tmortagne> it's not the same thing  
10:21 <vmassol> it's hard to differentiate them  
10:21 <vmassol> there's no way  
10:21 <vmassol> so when someone new adds a SS in the internal package  
10:21 <tmortagne> yes there is, privat SS will be in internal now  
10:21 <vmassol> we won't know if it's a mistake  
10:21 <vmassol> or if it's correct  
10:21 <vmassol> and you can be sure there'll be mistakes  
10:21 <tmortagne> I don't see how it's different from any other class  
10:22 <vmassol> and you think it's working well for other classes? :)  
10:22 <vmassol> it's full of mistakes  
10:22 <vmassol> which broken our apis several times already  
10:22 <vmassol> and it's not finished  
10:22 <vmassol> we had the possibility to be better for SS  
10:23 <tmortagne> there is use cases for non public SS, if you don't accept it that's another matter  
10:23 <vmassol> I think it's a false use case IMO  
10:23 <vmassol> if we have a need  
10:23 <vmassol> then others will have the need too  
10:23 <vmassol> anyway I won't move it ATM  
10:24 <vmassol> and I won't write my check as a consequence  
10:24 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:24 <vmassol> saves me time  
10:24 <vmassol> ...  
10:24 <polx> has quit  
10:25 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
10:28 <polx> has quit  
10:29 <vmassol> tmortagne: ExtensionManagerScriptService is ok to be moved?  
10:29 <tmortagne> vmassol: the only private one is distribution  
10:32 <tmortagne> and by the way I don't see what prevent you do do your check, just add exclusion support in it  
10:32 <vmassol> ahaha so you recognize it's an exclusion ;)  
10:32 <vmassol> (yes I know)  
10:33 <tmortagne> from teh point of view of your check...  
10:33 <vmassol> hehe  
10:51 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you want me to mark LocalizationScriptService as @unstable?  
10:51 <vmassol> I think it would be prudent  
10:52 <tmortagne> vmassol: all the rest of the API is so I guess it's the same  
10:52 <vmassol> especially since we had some discussion about the api  
10:52 <vmassol> no, the comment was about the SS  
10:52 <vmassol> and I kind of agree  
10:57 <mflorea> vmassol: do you know if Velocity templates are cached on xwiki.org . By default only macros.vm is cached afaik, but if I modify menuview.vm on xwiki.org (ssh, in order to investigate a bug) my change doesn't have any effect. I've checked and this template is not overwritten in the skin.  
11:02 <tmortagne> mflorea: what kind of chance was it ?  
11:02 <tmortagne> change  
11:02 <mflorea> minify:false on a jsx  
11:02 <mflorea> ofc I cleared my cache :)  
11:03 <tmortagne> I meant in menuview.vm  
11:03 <mflorea> yes, adding minify:false to a $xwiki.jsx call  
11:03 <mflorea> so that I can debug the JS code  
11:04 <mflorea> menuview.vm include SharePage jsx  
11:04 <tmortagne> was it inside a velocity macro ?  
11:05 <mflorea> nop  
11:05 <tmortagne> ok so not related to the macro cache then, I don't see how your change could not be taken into account except for a skin overwrite  
11:06 <tmortagne> is it on the main wiki ?  
11:08 <mflorea> I'm looking at the main wiki yes  
11:08 <tmortagne> se http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/XWikiOrgCode/Skin?editor=object  
11:08 <tmortagne> see  
11:08 <tmortagne> the menuview is actually overwritten  
11:08 <tmortagne> but since it's not listed in the class you probably missed it  
11:09 <tmortagne> but the code handling skins does not care about the class  
11:09 <vmassol> (sorry otp mgmt meeting)  
11:09 <tmortagne> the skin class need to be fixed  
11:09 <tmortagne> or remove those fields from the object if we don't want them  
11:09 <tmortagne> ( mflorea )  
11:10 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:10 <mflorea> arr, indeed  
11:11 <mflorea> thanks  
11:11 <mflorea> removing deprecated properties  
11:13 <tmortagne> maybe they are needed  
11:13 <mflorea> indeed  
11:13 <mflorea> they are  
11:13 <vmassol> guys we need to uprgade myxwiki.org to 5.2 (and xwiki.org too)  
11:13 <vmassol> we need to plan this with some volunteers ;)  
11:13 <mflorea> so those props need to be added to the skin class as yo usaid  
11:14 <mflorea> I'll add the missing props that currently have a value  
11:45 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <vmassol> mflorea: you might want to include http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9309 in your list of jira issues for 5.3 for search ;)  
11:49 <ldubost> has quit  
11:49 <mflorea> vmassol: ok, but it's not fully up to me  
11:50 <vmassol> wdym? I was thinking that since you're going to work on indices this might be in the same area  
11:51 <mflorea> there might other Solr issues more important  
11:51 <vmassol> yes sure but it's pretty high  
11:55 <Denis> mflorea: Hi, have you seen the comment from Danilo about JWPlayer extension, do you confirm it ?  
11:56 <mflorea> Denis: I've seen his comment a while back but I haven't tested yet on IE  
12:03 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
12:10 <vmassol> tmortagne: is it normal that you have this class WikiStreamTypeTest in wikistream-script?  
12:10 <vmassol> (this module contains only a script service)  
12:11 <vmassol> and wikiStreamtype is in -api  
12:12 <tmortagne> vmassol: it's not normal, too much copy/pasting  
12:12 <vmassol> k I'll let you move it  
12:12 <tmortagne> don't  
12:13 <tmortagne> I have many changes on wikistream, it's better if you let me take care of this  
12:13 <vmassol> please re-read my message :)  
12:13 <tmortagne> ok read too quickly...  
12:13 <vmassol> :)  
12:13 <vmassol> yuck...  
12:13 <vmassol> just noticed that DefaultWorkspaceManager is using a SS  
12:14 <vmassol>     private WikiManagerScriptService getWikiManager()  
12:14 <vmassol> bad bad  
12:14 <tmortagne> that's the issue with old plugin there is no real Java apis  
12:14 <vmassol> this is not old  
12:14 <tmortagne> wikimanager is  
12:14 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: would be great if you could refactor this in your work  
12:14 <tmortagne> and workspaces reuse wikimanager  
12:14 <vmassol> ah I see  
12:15 <tmortagne> that's the SS it's injecting btw  
12:15 <vmassol> still not nice  
12:15 <vmassol> but I understan  
12:15 <vmassol> d  
12:34 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: it is the old module that we are going to deprecate  
12:36 <tmortagne> yes wikimanager is supposed to be fully covered by the new API, at least the Java part  
12:37 <vmassol> indeed  
12:46 <vmassol> guys does xwiki-platform-workspace-ui build for you?  
12:46 <vmassol> I get a failure and I don't see why my changes would make it fail  
12:47 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:50 <msmeria> has quit  
13:05 <ldubost> has quit  
13:12 <vmassol> ouch:  
13:12 <vmassol> [INFO] --- xwiki-platform-tool-xmldoc-update-plugin:5.3-SNAPSHOT:attach (attach-template-features-xar) @ xwiki-platform-workspace-ui ---  
13:12 <vmassol> Segmentation fault: 11

13:12 <vmassol> usually it fails with

13:53 <vmassol> yes  
13:53 <vmassol> better  
13:54 <tmortagne> workspace-ui alone with -U ?  
13:54 <vmassol> alone  
13:54 <vmassol> I didn't use -U  
13:54 <vmassol> let me try wiht it  
13:55 <tmortagne> BUILD SUCCESS  
13:57 <vmassol> hmm  
13:57 <vmassol> hmm works too with -U

15:17 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
15:27 <vmassol> tmortagne: just coded teh check for scriptservice but the problem is that a lot of modules have excludes on them….  
15:27 <tmortagne> exclude on what ?  
15:27 <vmassol> the script service class  
15:28 <tmortagne> I don't understand, a lot of module already have exclude for a check you just coded ?  
15:28 <vmassol> yep because they don't exclude for a check, they exclude the whole file  
15:29 <vmassol> anyway I'll still commit it  
15:29 <vmassol> it'll be as good as it can be  
15:30 <tmortagne> do you have an example ?  
15:32 <vmassol> https://gist.github.com/vmassol/6901350  
15:32 <vmassol> (tmortagne)  
15:33 <vmassol> for the distribution module there's no risk it'll fail ATM all classes are excluded! ;)  
15:33 <vmassol> (except one)  
15:33 <tmortagne> vmassol: what you added is a checkstyle rule ? I tough it was an enforcer rule  
15:33 <vmassol> yep checktyle  
15:33 <vmassol> there's no way to check that with an enforcer rule AFAIK  
15:33 <vmassol> well it's possible but not meant for that  
15:34 <vmassol> (it doesn't provide an AST)  
15:34 <tmortagne> does not really sounds like checkstyle that's why I did not even tough about it  
15:34 <vmassol> ok  
15:34 <vmassol> although I went for the quick impl  
15:34 <tmortagne> s/checkstyle/code style/  
15:34 <vmassol> (I didn't check all impemented interfaces)  
15:35 <vmassol> instead I just checked that the class name ends with ScriptService...  
15:35 <vmassol> good enough FTM, we can improve later on if we want  
15:35 <vmassol> it was easy to write a check in checkstyle btw, took me about 15 minutes max  
16:17 <vmassol> sdumitriu: hi, is that something you could look at http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Polls+Application?viewer=comments#xwikicomment\_4 ?  
16:17 <vmassol> seems to be missing a translation too  
16:17 <vmassol> it's probably jsut lissing "html": "true"  
16:17 <vmassol> \*missing  
16:19 <vmassol> would actually be great to reguster the app in the application panel too and to have the translation automatic

17:47 <Panther\_1> has joined #xwiki  
17:47 <Panther\_1> hi  
17:50 <Panther\_1> How can I display the view of "Failed to execute the [velocity] macro"  
17:51 <evalica> click on it?  
17:53 <Panther\_1> evalica: no I mean preventing taht it will be shown to public  
17:57 <vmassol> fix the error?  
17:57 <vmassol> :)  
17:57 <Panther\_1> vmassol: should end in an upgrade and nor possible in the moment  
17:57 <Panther\_1> vmassol: is there no setup to hide this exceptions?  
17:57 <vmassol> this is script that is failing  
17:58 <vmassol> hiding means not executing it  
17:58 <vmassol> so don't execute it  
17:58 <vmassol> and you won't see the error  
17:58 <vmassol> now you could use CSS to not show it but it's a bad idea IMO  
17:58 <vmassol> because you'll hide legit errors  
17:58 <vmassol> it's done voluntarily so that you can see there's an error  
17:58 <vmassol> if you ignore it it means something will not work  
17:59 <Panther\_1> vmassol: yes but i think it would be better if this error's are only show special users or networks not to public  
18:01 <vmassol> where is it displayed?  
18:01 <Panther\_1> /bin/view/Main/DatabaseSearch?text=.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//boot.ini  
18:01 <Panther\_1> for example  
18:02 <vmassol> wdym?  
18:02 <vmassol> http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/DatabaseSearch?text=.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//boot.ini  
18:02 <vmassol> ?  
18:02 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
18:02 <vmassol> works fine  
18:03 <mflorea> has quit  
18:03 <vmassol> the search should never fail ofc I agree  
18:03 <Panther\_1> vmassol: as i said older version here  
18:03 <vmassol> so you're saying that your search is failing?  
18:04 <Panther\_1> yes but only with paramters like this  
18:05 <Panther\_1> vmassol: normal search runs  
18:05 <vmassol> what you can do is edit this page and modify the content to not display the error  
18:06 <Panther\_1> Wiki' and doc.space <> 'WatchCode' and doc.space <> 'WatchSheets' and doc.space <> 'XApp' and doc.space <> 'WatchAdmin' and doc.space <> 'Watch' and doc.space <> 'ColorThemes' and doc.space <> 'AnnotationCode' and doc.name<>'WebPreferences' and upper(doc.fullName) like upper('%.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//.../...//boot.ini%') order by doc.date desc]  
18:06 <Panther\_1> Wrapped Exception: could not execute query"  
18:06 <Panther\_1> arg soory  
18:06 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
18:07 <sburjan> has quit  
18:08 <Panther\_1> vmassol: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/skin/resources/uicomponents/container/columns.css/%22whscheck=%22whscheck?columns=2 <-- also throws an exception with internal informations to public  
18:08 <polx> has quit  
18:09 <vmassol> Panther\_1: yes and that's good  
18:09 <vmassol> it says: "A problem occurred while trying to process your request. Please contact the webmaster if this happens again." and then the error  
18:09 <vmassol> the UI could be improved slightly but it's good to show the message so that users can report it  
18:10 <Panther\_1> vmassol: yes and if someone will du evil things he cann get so more informations as you want  
18:10 <vmassol> in this specific case though it would be better to handle the problem better  
18:10 <vmassol> evil?  
18:10 <vmassol> we protect against evil  
18:10 <vmassol> :)  
18:10 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
18:10 <Panther\_1> vmassol: better would be give the user an error message and save the exceptions somere else with an reference  
18:11 <Panther\_1> vmassol: so if the user complains the admin can take a look into the log  
18:12 <vmassol> you might be able to change the error page  
18:12 <vmassol> have you tried that?  
18:13 <vmassol> hmm maybe not, I don't know, worth a try maybe  
18:13 <Panther\_1> vmassol: I haven't found anything yet
